actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to require the promulgation of minimum safety standards for school bus external warning devices.

summary.text: Amends the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to promulgate safety standards for school bus external warning devices.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to require the promulgation of minimum safety standards for school bus external warning devices.
